original: ba  da
analyzed: ba  da

original: :dang   :ba/la / :bsto' :bab :ba  :cheg :ba :ba🔽@mgar pa dri pas mdzad pa'i bsgrub thabs kyi dbu bzhugs/_byed/_/rgya
analyzed: :dang   :ba/la / :bsto' :bab :ba  :cheg :ba :ba @mgar pa dri pas mdzad pa'i bsgrub thabs kyi dbu bzhugs/_byed/_/rgya

original: gar skad du/_mtshhan dang mtshhan gyi gzhung gsung rgya gar gyi mtshhanaa ka ni ma nu 'khor ba nas sgrol ba dang bdud🔽dang sdoms pa 'joms pa'i stobs mnga' ba zer bi ra na sa d+ha na na ma/_shin tu byin rlabs che gsung sgyur na/
analyzed: gar skad du/_mtshhan dang mtshhan gyi gzhung gsung rgya gar gyi mtshhanaa ka ni ma nu 'khor ba nas sgrol ba dang bdud dang sdoms pa 'joms pa'i stobs mnga' ba zer bi ra na sa d+ha na na ma/_shin tu byin rlabs che gsung sgyur na/

original: de la bod go bde bar/_bod skad du/_dpa' bo gcig pa'i yum kyang med pa'i bsgrub bsgrub
analyzed: de la bod go bde bar/_bod skad du/_dpa' bo gcig pa'i yum kyang med pa'i bsgrub bsgrub

original: par bya ba'i don gyis bsgrub pa ste 'bras bus gsung dmigs pa med pa'i lugs rjes ma nu don byed pa thabs ste rdo rdze
analyzed: par bya ba'i don gyis bsgrub pa ste 'bras bus gsung dmigs pa med pa'i lugs rjes ma nu don byed pa thabs ste rdo rdze

original: bzlas zhes bya ba/_yi ge pa'i rang dang gzhan gyi stong pa nyid rtogs pa'i ye shes drug pa rdo rje 'chang dpal rdo
analyzed: bzlas zhes bya ba/_yi ge pa'i rang dang gzhan gyi stong pa nyid rtogs pa'i ye shes drug pa rdo rje 'chang dpal rdo

original: rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshhal lo//brgub pa por phun tshhogs dang por thun gyi mal nas tho rangs🔽langs la rang gi gang du na snying kar a dkar po bzhengs pa gang las na khams bde ba'i yan lag tu khrus
analyzed: rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshhal lo//brgub pa por phun tshhogs dang por thun gyi mal nas tho rangs langs la rang gi gang du na snying kar a dkar po bzhengs pa gang las na khams bde ba'i yan lag tu khrus
translated: The practitioner, having risen from the bed at the end of the first watch of the night,🔽should wash as a branch of the practice for the sake of health.🔽Then, on a comfortable seat, with the vajra posture and so forth, light radiates from the white A at the heart, which is the source of the illness.

original: byas stan bde ba la rdo rje dkyil dkrung sogs kyis pa 'od 'phros pas rang gzhan gnyis kyis bsdus pa'i khams gsum gyi🔽dngos po thams cad thig le'i ngo bor bsdus nas thig le gang gang pa ste zla ba'i po pa dkyil pa gang na 'khor yug las 'di phyi ma drim med par dri gsal ba bsam par bya ste/_de'i zla ba gang
analyzed: byas stan bde ba la rdo rje dkyil dkrung sogs kyis pa 'od 'phros pas rang gzhan gnyis kyis bsdus pa'i khams gsum gyi dngos po thams cad thig le'i ngo bor bsdus nas thig le gang gang pa ste zla ba'i po pa dkyil pa gang na 'khor yug las 'di phyi ma drim med par dri gsal ba bsam par bya ste/_de'i zla ba gang
translated: This light gathers all things of the three realms, which are included in oneself and others, into the essence of a bindu.🔽Then, imagine that the bindu, the size of a pea, is on the crown of one’s head, and that it is clear and without impurities.🔽In the center of that moon, imagine the syllable hum, which is deep blue like a clear crystal.

original: du na steng du yi ge gang na hum mthing ka shel dang ba lta bu bsams lus ngag yid gsum dag par bya
analyzed: du na steng du yi ge gang na hum mthing ka shel dang ba lta bu bsams lus ngag yid gsum dag par bya
translated: Then, imagine that one’s body, speech, and mind are purified.

original: pa'i 'od zer lcags kyu lta bu kyis bla ma sangs rgyas dang bo rnyi rnams kyi ngo bo yin pas mdun du spyan
analyzed: pa'i 'od zer lcags kyu lta bu kyis bla ma sangs rgyas dang bo rnyi rnams kyi ngo bo yin pas mdun du spyan
translated: Visualize that the essence of the guru and the buddhas is in the form of hooks that draw the gurus and buddhas from their natural abodes to the front.

original: drangs pa'i gsal bar dmigs la/_bzhi lus dbul phyag byas ci nus pa'i rdzas sam yid kyi nyer spyad lngas
analyzed: drangs pa'i gsal bar dmigs la/_bzhi lus dbul phyag byas ci nus pa'i rdzas sam yid kyi nyer spyad lngas
translated: Offer them whatever you can, such as the five close enjoyment offerings of substances or of the mind.

original: mchod pa skyabs 'gro yi rang sems bskyed yongs su bsngo ba rnams dang dkon mchog gsum sogs kyi bshags🔽pa la sogs pa bya'o/_/bshags pa 'am mi dmigs par bya dus nam na de nas thams cad 'od du gyur pa🔽bsdus la de nas tshhad bzhi snye rang gi snying ka'i hum la dmigs la/_om shu n+ya ta stong pa nyid dz+nya na
analyzed: mchod pa skyabs 'gro yi rang sems bskyed yongs su bsngo ba rnams dang dkon mchog gsum sogs kyi bshags pa la sogs pa bya'o/_/bshags pa 'am mi dmigs par bya dus nam na de nas thams cad 'od du gyur pa bsdus la de nas tshhad bzhi snye rang gi snying ka'i hum la dmigs la/_om shu n+ya ta stong pa nyid dz+nya na
translated: Then confess your faults to the Three Jewels and so forth.🔽Then visualize the four syllables in your heart and recite:🔽Om shunyata jnana vajra svabhava atmako ham.

original: badzra rdo rje swa b+ha 7_ba dang ye shes de da res stong pa ngo bo nyid ad bdag nyid ma ko ham nga'o zhes brjod
analyzed: badzra rdo rje swa b+ha 7_ba dang ye shes de da res stong pa ngo bo nyid ad bdag nyid ma ko ham nga'o zhes brjod
translated: The meaning of this is: Om, the nature of the wisdom of emptiness is my very own nature.

original: cing thig le yang yal stong pa nyid du bsam par bya'o/_/gang du na stong par bsam pa'i nam mkha'
analyzed: cing thig le yang yal stong pa nyid du bsam par bya'o/_/gang du na stong par bsam pa'i nam mkha'
translated: Then the bindu also vanishes and one should think of emptiness.

original: stong pa'i dbus su pha ljang gu las pad+ma 'dab ma sna tshhogs pa'i steng du yi ge a las ji ltar na zla ba'i
analyzed: stong pa'i dbus su pha ljang gu las pad+ma 'dab ma sna tshhogs pa'i steng du yi ge a las ji ltar na zla ba'i
translated: In the center of the space of the thought of emptiness, a green paṃ becomes a lotus with multicolored petals.🔽On that, from a white a, a moon maṇḍala arises.

original: dkyil 'khor gyi steng du ka las dmar po bzhes pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dmar po de'i🔽dbus su yi ge hum kha dog sngon po zer kyang mthing ga de las 'od 'phros pas sems can thams cad sangs
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi steng du ka las dmar po bzhes pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dmar po de'i dbus su yi ge hum kha dog sngon po zer kyang mthing ga de las 'od 'phros pas sems can thams cad sangs
translated: On that, from kaṃ, a red sun maṇḍala arises.🔽In the center of that, a blue hūṃ radiates light rays, which summon the buddhas of the ten directions and transform them into the form of a hūṃ.

original: rgyas la bkod pa dang sems can sangs rgyas su byas pa dang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams tshhur bsdus te yongs su
analyzed: rgyas la bkod pa dang sems can sangs rgyas su byas pa dang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams tshhur bsdus te yongs su
translated: That hūṃ enters into one’s heart.

original: gyur pa las/_zhal cig pa phyag gnyis pa/_zhi bas mi 'dul ba la rol pa'i khro bo spyan gsum pa/
analyzed: gyur pa las/_zhal cig pa phyag gnyis pa/_zhi bas mi 'dul ba la rol pa'i khro bo spyan gsum pa/
translated: One should imagine that one has become Vajra Heruka, with one face, two hands, and three eyes.

original: g.yas brkyang pas 'jigs byed dang g.yon bskum pas dus mtshhan mo mnan pa/_spyi bo zla
analyzed: g.yas brkyang pas 'jigs byed dang g.yon bskum pas dus mtshhan mo mnan pa/_spyi bo zla
translated: One is wrathful, with a wrathful expression, and one’s right leg is extended and the left leg is contracted.🔽One’s hair is bound up on the crown of one’s head.

original: ba phyed pas mtshhan pa'i ral pa ste dbu skra sil bu sked par sleb pa thor cog tu bcings pa cod pan
analyzed: ba phyed pas mtshhan pa'i ral pa ste dbu skra sil bu sked par sleb pa thor cog tu bcings pa cod pan
translated: His hair is tied in a topknot that reaches his shoulders and is adorned with a half-moon crest.

original: can/_dpral bar thor khacog dar gyis bcings pa dar spungs kyi thod pa skam po lnga'i 'phreng bas dbu la
analyzed: can/_dpral bar thor khacog dar gyis bcings pa dar spungs kyi thod pa skam po lnga'i 'phreng bas dbu la
translated: His forehead is bound with a turban, and his head is adorned with a garland of five dry skulls.

original: skra mtshhams na tshhur brgyan pa/_gdu bu dpung brgyan la sogs pa'i phyag rgya drug dang /_zla ba phyed pa'i
analyzed: skra mtshhams na tshhur brgyan pa/_gdu bu dpung brgyan la sogs pa'i phyag rgya drug dang /_zla ba phyed pa'i
translated: His hair is adorned with a half-moon crest. He is adorned with the six symbolic ornaments, such as the armlets, and a half-moon

original: spyi gtshug steng du sna tshhogs rdo rjes bsrung ba mtshhan pa/_stag gi pags pa'i rlon zla
analyzed: spyi gtshug steng du sna tshhogs rdo rjes bsrung ba mtshhan pa/_stag gi pags pa'i rlon zla
translated: crest on the top of his head. He is protected by a crossed vajra. He wears a tiger-skin skirt

original: sgang bshags byas pa'i 'jam la ngos su skabs g.yas pa bcug pa sham thabs can/_phyag g.yas pas
analyzed: sgang bshags byas pa'i 'jam la ngos su skabs g.yas pa bcug pa sham thabs can/_phyag g.yas pas
translated: with the head to the left and the tail to the right.

original: rin po che gser las byas pa'i rdo rje rtshe lnga pa gsor ba thugs kar tshhul gyis 'dzin pa'o/_/g.yon
analyzed: rin po che gser las byas pa'i rdo rje rtshe lnga pa gsor ba thugs kar tshhul gyis 'dzin pa'o/_/g.yon
translated: His right hand holds a five-pronged vajra made of gold at his heart.

original: pas thod pa dum bu gcig pa bdud srin po'i khrag gis bkang ba bsnams pa/_nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
analyzed: pas thod pa dum bu gcig pa bdud srin po'i khrag gis bkang ba bsnams pa/_nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
translated: His left hand holds a skull cup filled with the blood of the demon rākṣasas.🔽He sits on a sun seat.

original: dpa' bo gcig pa'i bsgrub thabs zhes bya ba/
analyzed: dpa' bo gcig pa'i bsgrub thabs zhes bya ba/
translated: The Sādhana of the Single Hero

original: gyi dbus 'jigs byed dang dus mtshhan gyi steng na bzhugs pa bsams pas dam tshhig pa bskyed la_/
analyzed: gyi dbus 'jigs byed dang dus mtshhan gyi steng na bzhugs pa bsams pas dam tshhig pa bskyed la_/
translated: Visualize that in the center of the body, on top of Bhairava and Kālarātri, is the creation of the pledge beings.

original: gang gis na de'i snying ka'i ye shes kyi ngo bor byin gyis brlabs pa'i yi ge hum las 'od 'phros pas
analyzed: gang gis na de'i snying ka'i ye shes kyi ngo bor byin gyis brlabs pa'i yi ge hum las 'od 'phros pas
translated: Through the light that radiates from the syllable hūṃ, which is consecrated as the essence of the gnosis being in the heart center,

original: bdag gnyid ye shes ngo bor brlab pa 'dis zin gzung dang 'dra ba'i ji shes sems
analyzed: bdag gnyid ye shes ngo bor brlab pa 'dis zin gzung dang 'dra ba'i ji shes sems
translated: the mind, which is like the object of observation, is consecrated as the essence of gnosis.

original: dpa' spyan shes la mchod par ma 'dor bar rang gi snying kar ste lus thams cad la thim🔽par bzhugs par bya'o/_/de nas dus bzhi gang gis na om a hum gsum gyis gang du na gnas
analyzed: dpa' spyan shes la mchod par ma 'dor bar rang gi snying kar ste lus thams cad la thim par bzhugs par bya'o/_/de nas dus bzhi gang gis na om a hum gsum gyis gang du na gnas
translated: The gnosis being, which is like the apprehender, is not dismissed but dissolves into the heart center and the entire body.

original: gsum du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku rdo rje sogs su byin gyis brlabs la/_gang gis na nam
analyzed: gsum du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku rdo rje sogs su byin gyis brlabs la/_gang gis na nam
translated: Then, through the four times, with oṃ āḥ hūṃ, wherever, in the three places, all tathāgatas’ vajra body, and so on, are consecrated,

original: mkha'i khams nas yum sngar ye shes sems dpa' dang dus mnyam du spyan drangs pa'i rdo rje phag mo
analyzed: mkha'i khams nas yum sngar ye shes sems dpa' dang dus mnyam du spyan drangs pa'i rdo rje phag mo
translated: by whom, from the space element, the mother Vajravārāhī, who was previously invoked simultaneously with the gnosis being,

original: phyag na ye shes kyi ji ltar na rin po che'i bum pa zer te ka ba la gsol ba btab bdud rtshi gang ba bsnams🔽pas bzhi sha btag tu mngon par 'khu bar gsung dbang bskur bar bsams la yum rdo rje phag mo 'od
analyzed: phyag na ye shes kyi ji ltar na rin po che'i bum pa zer te ka ba la gsol ba btab bdud rtshi gang ba bsnams pas bzhi sha btag tu mngon par 'khu bar gsung dbang bskur bar bsams la yum rdo rje phag mo 'od
translated: Imagine that the wisdom being Vajrayoginī, who is similar to the one in front, dissolves into you.🔽🔽Then, as you supplicate the master with “Master, please grant me🔽the conferral of the empowerment,” imagine that the master, who is inseparable from the front mandala, holds a jeweled vase filled with the elixir of awareness in his right hand.🔽

original: zer du gyur pas mthar rang nyid la thim pas thabs shes rab gnyis su med par bsam zhing b+he
analyzed: zer du gyur pas mthar rang nyid la thim pas thabs shes rab gnyis su med par bsam zhing b+he
translated: Imagine that the wisdom being Vajrayoginī dissolves into you, and think that method and wisdom become nondual.

original: bar bya ste/_snying khar 'khor lo rtshibs drug pa la yi ge bdun pa bkod la/_'phrin
analyzed: bar bya ste/_snying khar 'khor lo rtshibs drug pa la yi ge bdun pa bkod la/_'phrin
translated: At the heart is a six-spoked wheel with the seven syllables arranged on it.🔽In accordance with the activity, the color of the deity and the mantra should be changed.

original: las mthun par stes la las sbyor dus su dus thams cad du lha dang /_kha dog mthun pa zhi ba la dkar sogs🔽zlas pa bya'o/_/sku la tshhig kyang bsgyur bas lus ye shes kyi lus thams cad 'ja' lta bu snang la rang
analyzed: las mthun par stes la las sbyor dus su dus thams cad du lha dang /_kha dog mthun pa zhi ba la dkar sogs zlas pa bya'o/_/sku la tshhig kyang bsgyur bas lus ye shes kyi lus thams cad 'ja' lta bu snang la rang
translated: For pacifying, it should be white, and so on.

original: bzhin med pa dang /_yi ge mar me lta bu 'od gsal ba dang dang /_'od spro ba dang rgyu las
analyzed: bzhin med pa dang /_yi ge mar me lta bu 'od gsal ba dang dang /_'od spro ba dang rgyu las
translated: Since the body is also transformed, the entire body of timeless awareness appears like a rainbow, with no intrinsic nature, and the syllables are like a clear butter lamp, radiating light and emanating from the cause.

original: thar yang tshhur sdud pa ser po kha gyen la bstan pa/_hum gcig lta ba la gnas pa yi ge drug g.yon bskor du dang bcas pas rgyun mi 'chad par bsam par byas yongs su bsngo ba yang bya la/_yi ge brgya pa
analyzed: thar yang tshhur sdud pa ser po kha gyen la bstan pa/_hum gcig lta ba la gnas pa yi ge drug g.yon bskor du dang bcas pas rgyun mi 'chad par bsam par byas yongs su bsngo ba yang bya la/_yi ge brgya pa
translated: One should also do the dedication.

original: bdun nam gsum sogs dus nam bzlas la mthar snying khar gsum gong sdom pa la thugs rdo rje'i hum 'og tu/_ye
analyzed: bdun nam gsum sogs dus nam bzlas la mthar snying khar gsum gong sdom pa la thugs rdo rje'i hum 'og tu/_ye
translated: At the end of the recitation of the hundred-syllable mantra seven, three, or however many times, at the heart, below the hūṃ of mind-vajra,

original: shes kyi ngo bo'i gong du de nyid kyi bar du bzlas pa'i dus kyi 'khor lo sgo dmigs pa res 'jog byed pas bzlas pa'i dus
analyzed: shes kyi ngo bo'i gong du de nyid kyi bar du bzlas pa'i dus kyi 'khor lo sgo dmigs pa res 'jog byed pas bzlas pa'i dus
translated: one should visualize the time-wheel of the recitation of the essence of timeless awareness.🔽One should alternate the visualization of the other two times.

original: gzhan gnyis po'i dmigs pa gtong ba'o gsung gsung ldang bar gang na bya'o/_/grub pa'i skyes bu yin gsung🔽chan ber ka ris can zhang gi slob dpon 'gar pa ri pas mdzad pa rdzogs so//_/
analyzed: gzhan gnyis po'i dmigs pa gtong ba'o gsung gsung ldang bar gang na bya'o/_/grub pa'i skyes bu yin gsung chan ber ka ris can zhang gi slob dpon 'gar pa ri pas mdzad pa rdzogs so//_/
translated: One should arise from the recitation when one wishes.🔽This was composed by the master Garap Dorjé, a disciple of Zhang.

original: lo tshha ba mar pa chos kyi dbang phyug gis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o//_//
analyzed: lo tshha ba mar pa chos kyi dbang phyug gis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o//_//
translated: It was translated and finalized by the Indian preceptor Dharmabodhi and the translator Patsap Nyima Drak.

original: zhu dag dang nyan bshad kyi gsungs_/
analyzed: zhu dag dang nyan bshad kyi gsungs_/
translated: He taught the study of grammar and logic.
